title: Photo Of The Day: November 11, 2008
author: Christy Frink
excerpt: We loved the lighting in this shot by B. Marshall of a skateboarder teetering precariously on the edge of a trash can outside of City Hall (the real one, not
contentEncoded:
We loved the lighting in this shot by B. Marshall of a skateboarder teetering precariously on the edge of a trash can outside of City Hall (the real one, not the venue).

Photo Of The Day will be a recurring feature for Nashvillest as long you keep giving us stuff to post. Don’t worry–we’ll give you props. Just add them to the pool or tag them with “Nashvillest” if you’re feeling lazy.
